lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others that are taking the initiative to help themselves by starting their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I have retired from business.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now a jewelry designer and maker.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone hope with a hand up, and dignity, from them knowing that it is not a hand out. It is also really neat to track the progress of the businesses as they reach their goals!

lenders.name: reni
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it can help someone and make a difference in their life. There are a lot of hard working people out there who just need a little help to make their dreams come true.  "Pay it Forward"
lenders.occupational_info: I help people recover from injuries/surgeries to restore their health/physical function.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I just want to show my kids that each of us can always do something nice for somebody somewhere in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working as General Manager and Director both in Chicago area and Silicon Valley.

lenders.name: Connie T.
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a place where I can help  people who are trying to help themselves.  I admire the way they have planned a project that will give them indpendence and, in many cases, benefit their community as well.  I applaud their dignity and feel honored to assist them.
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from a 30-year teaching career five years ago.  My husband had just passed away and I was determined to keep our farm operational as best I could.  I've kept a small herd of our cows and rented out the cropland.  It's been a real learning experience - not always easy but very rewarding!

lenders.name: Simba
lenders.loan_because: Helping Other People Everyday.
lenders.occupational_info: I help self employed people in North America.

lenders.name: Peter and Shelley
lenders.loan_because: We have had so many blessings thoughout our lives, we feel that without the help of others we wouldn't have been so successful.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: It is only right to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Stressful but interesting.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Free market capitalism is the best path to prosperity.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I care!

lenders.name: roisin
lenders.loan_because: i feel we as a family are very fortunate and blessed and as a result would like to help others

lenders.name: Amy & Zack
lenders.loan_because: We care.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I want to have a long supply of graiuns, beans, and spices for a bout a year and I would like to rent this small space to start a small vegetarian restaurant and also would want to buy a small stiove and some kitchen utensils, the profits will also go on helping poor people especially poor street children. I would want to have a regular feeding program on depressed areas every weekends. But I only have limited financial capacity so Im humbly asking anybody out there to lend any amount from their benevolent heart. I would greatly appreciate a donation of $1000 but any amount would do. Thank you very much.
lenders.occupational_info: Im a nurse but being a nurse here in the Philippines doesn't pay well compared to other countriues. I almost earn like minimun wage about $150 dollars a month. But I  have a passion for distributing food to the hungry so I find ways to keep my vegetarian feeding program to still continue

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to help provide economic opportunity for hard-working people around the world.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I feel everyone should have a chance to make a difference in this world. Provide the best they can for family, and have the will to do there very best!

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I can and I like helping people. These people are an inspiration.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate the production of various publications, being the link between the clients and the production crew.  I am also the editor and associate publisher of Bicycle Paper a cycling publication.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Giving to those who are working toward a goal of self-sufficiency is a good thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I search for your ancestors.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I am the loving parent of four children, one of whom is gay.  I know that not all parents can protect their children no matter how much they love them.  This is one way to help a few parents to, at the very least, give their children financial stability.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a public school. one on one with  students and their parents who homeschool them, consulting and teaching them how to homeschool.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: It is a small way to make a big difference.

lenders.name: Beegee
lenders.loan_because:
I like giving back to the world. 
So much has been given to me over the years, when I didn't have enough for my family. Now I can afford to give a little back, because I do have enough for my family!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes to people looking for a new place to live.

lenders.name: Lisa B.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.  Little things CAN make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find their ancestors and tell their stories, so that their legacy will continue for future generations.

lenders.name: Family of Ashwitha
lenders.loan_because:
We find this to be a splendidly meaningful, uplifting and responsible way to share your blessings with those for whom they will be much more valuable. 

Where is a NOBEL peace prize when you really need one, uhhhh ?  

KIVA wins it hands down !!!!
.
lenders.occupational_info: While we, the proud parents of Ashwitha (Achu) are both "Soft"ware Engineers at work, try hard as we may, manage barely to keep up with a "Soft" one at home :-)

lenders.name: dave/kim
lenders.loan_because: i  believe we should fight the war on poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: physical education and social studies teacher.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I can do something right now to help someone in need across the globe.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to achieve their full potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an alum of Santa Clara University, a Jesuit university located in the Silicon Valley, California.  Motivated by our core values - competence, conscience, and compassion - I hope to do my part in making a difference, however big or small it may be.

lenders.name: Rylona Watson
lenders.occupation: Independant Consultant for Ambit Energy, Inc.
lenders.loan_because: My contributions make a difference by helping to pull families up and out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is educating consumers about Energy Deregulation and the extraordinary opportunities afforded by this one time transfer of wealth.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I like to support needed businesses and I think this is a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying audio engineering

lenders.name: Maurice-Pierre
lenders.loan_because: HI! ~ I believe that we can make a GOOD difference locally but also can reach OUT further AWAY too and make an EVEN Greater DIFFERENCE in the life of Others who are less fortunate in life and NEED our Special Help and Support ! Ciao :)
lenders.occupational_info:
I do volunteering but still do some teaching as I am specialized in French; enjoying children's curiosity n eagerness to learn more... Do a variety of volunteering exp. now as it's my time in life to give back; LIFE has been good to me; I am so very thankful and want to Share and DO more...
KIVA seems like a real perfect opportunity!

lenders.name: charisma
lenders.loan_because: i want to start a onion bussiness here in my place.
lenders.occupational_info: im working as a reviser before and now i have a small bussines like transparrent glass for shake.

lenders.occupational_info: I am completing a masters degree at California State University so I can teach American, Mexican and Chinese history.

lenders.name: Geoff & Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: We like to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: We enjoy travelling and seeing the world.

lenders.name: ROBERT
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunte enough to be in a positon where I can help others, also, because I've been in the same position and needed help many times before.

lenders.name: Kremp Family
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to help others reach their goals and dreams.

lenders.name: samir
lenders.loan_because: For  a good this  cause this is least i can do.I higly encourage whoever can to do.May be this is one thing which will unite all human beings for the right cause peace on earth.

lenders.name: Arun | MeerMedia
lenders.loan_because:
We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.

- Winston Churchill

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I think those of us who have been blessed with much should be willing to help others who have not.

lenders.name: Meena
lenders.loan_because: I love making a better change in someone else's life
lenders.occupational_info: Working in Health Care

lenders.name: Werner
lenders.loan_because: It's the easiest and most efficient way to help people raising and developing their own business.

lenders.name: Maaike
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute to a better world, where there is not such a huge difference between rich en poor. I happen to be born in wealthy country. I want to help people, with my means and knowing where and who I help.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise (local) government to create a sustainable watersystem in city areas. Sustainable in this case is: not causing any problems in other places, time, etc. How do you manage groundwater, rain, surface water, etc.?

lenders.name: Debbi
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone else's life and that feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy photography

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: it creates a more personal connection than just donating to a large organization. It's an opportunity to feel grateful for what I have, and to help other people realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a massage therapist and energy medicine practitioner. I help people relax, become more balanced, and help to reduce pain.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to have a chance to succeed in life
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hard worker and am inventive. I like my work and enjoy it to the fullest. I got my tour bus drivers license and as of 2012. Currently unemployed.

lenders.name: claudie
lenders.loan_because:
I find Kiva a very useful tool , for helping people in need all around the world.What I find the most interesting is lending money instead of giving money.
That's also a good idea to get news from the 
journals!.It's a so great pleasure reading them!

lenders.name: Patricia & David
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Terrence
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to circulate the planet's resources.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people acheive their dreams.

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I have had the benefit of loans that allowed me to get an education and pursue a career in science. I think everyone should have that kind of opportunity and I hope I can pass along a little bit of help to someone else.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I'm trying to help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I design e-Learning courses on a contract basis.

lenders.name: Pepino Suave
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Fun.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: This program is a great way to give people the opportunities that have been given to me.  It doesn't take much to make a significant difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that develops new medications for people who are sick.

lenders.name: Monica & Cody
lenders.loan_because: When I really needed money, a good friend lent it to me, now it's time to complete the circle.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in microfinance and the impact it can have on local and global economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to American school children ages 11-14

lenders.name: yanira & Sebastian
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a little help from time to time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a giving person by nature and  I believe that is what makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: I.D.G.F. Group
lenders.loan_because: We beleive and trust.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams just as those have once helped me to achieve mine.  Lets keep "Paying it Forward."
lenders.occupational_info: We help women experiencing hair loss by providing them with natural and undetectable hair replacement systems.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: Because I can......simple as that. I have been blessed with a wonderful life and an intensely fulfilling career for which I went to school for 2 years, tuition free. I love what I do...I'm one of those rare people who happen to get a paycheck for what I do everyday. I make good money  and am very happy to pass it on to people who are less fortunate than I am, who can use the money to make better lives for themselves and their families and will appreciate it.
lenders.occupational_info: I do CAT scans at an imaging center in Florida.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are struggling but attempting to help themselves... sometimes people just need a little extra help...what a great opportunity this is....
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the process of discovering what it is I want to do with my life... I recently gave up my job sold my house and moved across the country to begin anew....

lenders.name: Kerstin Kramer
lenders.occupational_info: Translation Agency - translating documents from one language into another.

lenders.name: donna/gizmo
lenders.loan_because: it feels good ! everyone deserves a chance to support their familes - i'm glad to be able to help their dream!

lenders.name: Cake Bank
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help less fortunate people move forward in their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of friends who meet up to eat cake and micro lend.

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: I understand wanting to become successful.  If you have the will and the drive to succeed you can make all of your dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a first grade teacher in an impovershed Chicago neighborhood.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: helping people around the world makes me feel good, and trying to improve a persons life can benefit more than that person. I want to do whatever I can to help people around the world. And every time I make a donation, it encourages me to make another.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It's something I can do to support enterprising people in parts of the world where I work.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wildlife photographer that specializes in endangered species and conservation worldwide

lenders.name: Wilson World Issues
lenders.loan_because: the students of Mrs. Kaspar's World Issues class would like to make a contribution to developing regions worldwide.  We are happy to help those that would like a chance to build a business and be successful.

lenders.name: The Swallens
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help where help is needed.

lenders.name: BSH
lenders.loan_because: To show free markets work

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am also a small business owner. I want to make a difference where I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to make sure children's needs are met and I talk with children and families to help resolve conflicts and problems at home.

lenders.name: Sallee
lenders.loan_because: It is such a wonderful idea for people like me who have always loved giving of myself to others. In the past I have sponsored children. I like this idea even better. I would rather teach a man to fish, than just give him/her a fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired nurse. I now do computer work, building websites. I also work with dogs. I have trained my dog to work with disabled children.

lenders.name: JOHN&DIANE
lenders.loan_because:
IT'S THE RIGHT THING TO DO, AND IT FEELS GOOD!!!!
WHO SAID YOU CANT MAKE A DIFFERENCE.

lenders.name: Lettie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people become independent.  This improves self-esteem and the individual will be able to transfer this empowerment to others.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to international communities that I spent several years living and working in.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English, particularly how to spell. I also teach my children about the world and their place in it, and how they too can make a difference.

lenders.name: ADELAIDE
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a hand once in a lifetime
lenders.occupational_info: I ENJOY MY JOB, IT IS SACRED TO ME COOKING FOR THE PUBLIC,I DO IT WITH LOVE,RESPECT .I COOK LIKE IF I AM COOKING FOR MY FAMILY, NAMASTE

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed and have more than enough...therefore I try to give a helping hand to someone with hope in their heart.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I've always been searching for ways to make a difference in other people's lives.  I think helping people is one of our higher purposes.
lenders.occupational_info: business student

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because:
I realize how lucky I am. There are lots of people who need to get a chance in creating a better live. I hope that whit a little help from me, someone somewhere can make their dream a reality.

Doesn’t everyone deserve a chance!

lenders.name: Ivan&Dusty
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it  seems like the MOST simplistic way to help change a life.  We are afforded many opportunities in our own family simply because of where we were born:)  God's blessings and good health to all of you!
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I work as nurses.  We also run our own Adult Foster Care Home.  We care for Mentally Impaired, Physically Handicapped Adults.  We are the proud parents of 4 children.  This is our first loan and look forward to being able to give many more!

lenders.name: Rein Pulz
lenders.loan_because: it helps others.
lenders.occupational_info: Health care.

lenders.name: Larissa
lenders.occupational_info: I produce short and feature length narrative films that are socially responsible and entertaining.

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because: it gives me an opportunity to help support other people which in turn will have a positive effect on their community.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I had the chance to start my own business and I want other people to give that same chance, so they can support themselves and their families. And this is such a great way to make this possible all over the world.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: I work hard to travel and have the nice things in life.  I want to help other people around the world experience success and there dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Service Manager at a BMW dealership in California, USA.

lenders.name: Natascha
lenders.occupational_info: I do not work professionally so that I can be available to my young son 100% of his day.  He has a learning disablility and it is my job to make sure that he learns academics, ethics, street-smarts, and compassion in order for him to develop into a man who is self-sufficient, independent, and can take care of his family long after I am no longer on this earth.

lenders.name: Heather & Rob
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an incredible way to connect and make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Rob has a General Contracting/Construction business in Manhattan, NY USA.  Heather is a Buyer for a retailer in NY.  She buy the goods that the retailer sells.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It gives me a chance to support, in a small but significant way, individuals or families trying to improve their lives, particularly when other sources may be absent or difficult.
lenders.occupational_info: Newly retired, I can now set my own pace and choose the agenda. Besides keeping healthy  and productive, I tend to concentrate on my own family, though I do reach out to others, as well. I have an ample supply of positive things to do.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and I particularly like to help older women working in the difficult area of agriculture.

lenders.name: Jim & Tina
lenders.loan_because: We want to follow the instruction of Christ (Matthew 22:35-39, Love my neighbour as my self), share the blessed message that there is Hope of Salvation in Jesus Christ, and provide hope and support for those who have a will and courage to successed.

lenders.name: Peter Grevstad
lenders.loan_because: I worked in developing countries -Thailand, China and Viet Nam - for approximately ten years. I saw large initiatives that failed, and I believe in grassroots activism and giving/lending.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English teacher. I teach in a college in Toronto, Canada.  For nearly 15 years I worked in developing and developed countries.  The Czech Republic, Thailand, China, Viet Nam, and in Japan.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: "what do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?"
lenders.occupational_info: I am a painter, living and working in New York city.

lenders.name: Mike & Donna
lenders.loan_because: We want to help.

lenders.name: Jason & Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of Micro-economics to change the world.

lenders.name: Kristina & Ila

lenders.occupational_info: I provide health care for everyone in the family.  I value the family unit as a conduit to health and happiness.

lenders.name: Kathryn

lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my family and do volunteer work.

lenders.name: Spiro
lenders.loan_because: I have the opportunity to do so and contribution is very important in my life. The more you give, the more you get!

lenders.name: Linda

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others as I start out myself

lenders.name: Émilie
lenders.loan_because: It's a cheap and easy way to make tremendous difference in someone's life. There really is no reason not to do it!
lenders.occupational_info: My work consists in helping businesses present themselves in a beautiful and consistent way.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to do so. I feel obligated to help others who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the pleasure of working with kids who have difficulties learning in a regular classroom.

lenders.name: The Storey Family
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed and want to give back. We want to help others motivated to help themselves.

lenders.name: Elaine

Remembering Brynn forever, and ever.  I also have an online shop in order to raise funds for an arts school bursary in Brynn's name.  It is http://www.brynnalex.etsy.com

lenders.name: angie
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help out other women in the world.

lenders.name: Kristen and Josh

lenders.name: Beth and Randy
lenders.loan_because: this is an excellent opportunity to help someone else better their lives.

Carson

lenders.name: Ken

lenders.name: Brodie

lenders.name: Rebecca

lenders.occupational_info: I work in Silicon Valley representing companies who manufacture components who want to sell their products to companies in Silicon Valley.

lenders.name: The Martin Family
lenders.loan_because: If you teach a man to fish....

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: these hard working small entrepreneurs and their families deserve the support of those of us who live in easier conditions.

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to make a difference. I am giving these loans in the names of my various family members instead of Christmas presents. They will be happier!
lenders.occupational_info: We work with companies and people to help them improve.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: It's rewarding to make a difference for people, and such great fun recycling the money when it comes back!

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.occupation: I'm a f/t mom, that works p/t at a video store.
lenders.loan_because: The question is, "Why not?" Too many people take for granted what they have in life. My family and I are very blessed to have as much as we do. Reading these entrepreneur's stories, is a great reminder on how you can make a difference in someone's life. Just a small loan could turn a life around, in a very big way. Also, what better way is there, to teach my daughter about the gift of giving, and kindness? To laugh often and much; to win the respect of intelligent people and the affection of children; to earn the appreciation of honest critics and to endure the betrayal of false friends; to appreciate beauty; to find the best in others; to leave the world a bit better whether by a healthy child, a garden patch or a redeemed social condition; to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded. Ralph Waldo Emerson
lenders.occupational_info:
Everyone needs help at some point in their life, and I am extremely pleased to be able to be a part of this.

This site is one of the best things I have learned about in years! To think just a small loan can help someone better their health, home, and family, is very rewarding.

Thank you so much for making it possible for everyday people like me, to help out!

lenders.name: ohillary
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Chandler and Claire
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves!

lenders.name: DENNIS
lenders.loan_because: I have a passion for helping others!

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of this type of giving.  I joined the Peace Corps in the 60's and continue this path because I have seen it make a difference for everyone involved.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate. When I had to go out on my own at 50, I had a good education and a good job. I was able to build a good life in many ways. To be able lend a hand to another human being struggling to build a life, is a blessing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 78 years old so I don't have to go to work every day. I still love to help people learn something new.

lenders.name: Alwina
lenders.loan_because: If not me, who?
lenders.occupational_info: I work with graduate students at a university, helping them get the support and services they need to be successful.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful to those who helped me when I was in need. All the best to you!

lenders.name: sharon
lenders.loan_because:
of Mother Teresa
When a poor person dies of hunger,
it has not happened because God did not take care of him or her. 
It has happened because neither you nor I wanted to
give that person what he or she needed.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: "What do we live for if not to make the world less difficult for each other" George Eliot
lenders.occupational_info: We grow fresh sweet cherries which are exported all over the world.

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: Because i am blessed with financial security and i would like to help people make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of ill adults and children in their home

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I received support from many people along the way and want to carry on the tradition. We can and do make a difference. Living in Canada means we have access to capital everywhere and everyone deserves this possibility.
lenders.occupational_info: We design and facilitate learning experiences where the participants actively engage and learn together. About themselves, each other, their organization, and the world. Learning does change the world.

lenders.name: Pierre Mourier
lenders.loan_because: I believe in market-driven solutions.

lenders.name: Todd & Tov
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world

lenders.name: Tina- Maryland
lenders.loan_because: all those who want to work and can work..should be given the opportunity to work.

lenders.name: Blackwell
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I write.

lenders.name: Leslye
lenders.loan_because: my family and I enjoy the joy that comes from helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping at-risk kids leave to love reading.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I hope that my loans will improve the lives of others and that there would be people to help me if I was in need.  My mother grew up with 8 brothers and sisters and lived in poverty while growing up.  Hearing her stories from childhood makes me want to help others who are in the same circumstance.
lenders.occupational_info:
During various periods in my life, I have been without a job, even with a bachelor's degree so I know how hard it can be trying to make it in this world.  But I continue to strive to make my life better.  Sometimes I think my life is not so great but then when I look at other people in the world, I realize how fortunate I am and I believe in sharing my wealth, albeit small, that I do have.

Currently, I make bracelets and draw sketches (mostly oriental sketches).

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.occupation: Mother and Part-Owner of HVAC Company

lenders.name: Aundra
lenders.loan_because: I feel like it is the right thing to do. I hope that one day I will be able to donate more.

lenders.name: Maji
lenders.loan_because: it is an innovative and fresh way to help those in need
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school in hopes of one day becoming a surgeon.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: with less money than my family would spend on dinner at a restaurant, I can empower someone who wants to make a big change in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that my 2 boys are fed, well rested, educated and loved.

lenders.name: Jamie & Mark
lenders.loan_because: We have so much and it was time to play it forward
lenders.occupational_info: We are just people who care about others in the world

lenders.name: Bjorn
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back into communitites which I will travel through on my overland trip from the UK to Australia

lenders.name: Raz
lenders.loan_because: I want to and I can

lenders.name: Jewelry Locker
lenders.loan_because: I love the feeling of knowing that someone in the world can live their dream, provide better for their family, and contribute to the quality of their community with what help I can afford through Christ who blesses me 'every day'.  Giving at home and abroad is but one of my obligations to repay the debt that Christ paid for me.  This is God's world!  I am but a servant of the Lord.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: To help someone improve their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Social Worker who works with people who have a terminal disease. I try to help the patient and their family prepare for death when medicine cannot cure them and they may have less than 6 months to live.  I work with a team of doctors, nurses, home health aides, chaplains and volunteers to help bring physical, social, emotional and spiritual comfort and dignity as they approach the end of their life.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: The loans allow me to participate in a new system for generating financial well being- person to person or small group. Thank you for the opportunity!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher of young children who believes in the power of compassion and self motivation.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: what you give out comes back multiplied !

lenders.name: Vickie
lenders.loan_because: I want to   "Be  the Change You Want to See in the World" .  I know that I have been born into a life of relative ease and abundance simply by virtue of being born in the US.  I recognize there are  those who were not as fortunate to win the geographic lottery and small  actions on their behalf   can make big differences..
lenders.occupational_info: I  am a CFP.    I  help people identify their life  goals and make strategies  toward fulfilling them.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: I like to support entrepreneurship globally.

lenders.name: Deanna
lenders.loan_because: I want others to know there are still good people left in this world!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at Oklahoma City Communitiy College.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I should

lenders.name: Briana
lenders.loan_because: I feel the need to end world hunger.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: We want individuals to financially and emotionally succeed by lending our good fortune to them. (Dad missing from photo)
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family embracing peace, health, happiness, education, and capitalism. (Dad missing from photo)

lenders.name: Roxanne
lenders.loan_because: small steps can make a difference

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I feel that it's my obligation to help out those in need.

lenders.name: nalinika
lenders.loan_because: I can, should and want to..

lenders.name: KATHERINE
lenders.loan_because: I want to support  and empower women in other parts of the world to improve their lives and the lives of their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am age 64 .. I have worked very hard since I was 14 years old  .. mostly selling a product.  By working very hard and saving I was able to raise two children to a high standard of living and blessed enough to retire modestly at age 56.

lenders.name: Joseph & Melissa
lenders.loan_because: My wife & I would like to offer financial assistance to aspiring entrepreneurs with the hope that they might be able to help others in the future.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: "One Planet, One People, Please."

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to make your own business a success and I want to help others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a shop that makes metal railings and I also just started an internet site with information about venues in the U.S.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: It gives me a chance to give others an opporunity to improve their lives so they in turn can help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage construction projects for Walt Disney World.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: A little help goes a long way in some parts of the world.  Kiva is a direct path to invest in the dreams of hardworking people.

lenders.name: Lisako
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled around the world, and seen the difference in what they have, to what I have.

lenders.name: Consensus Foundation
lenders.loan_because: We believe in teaching to fish, I only donate to groups or people that fulfill that premise. We love what KIVA is doing and will continue to support this vision.
lenders.occupational_info: Personal Growth, personal awareness of my feelings and results.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: such a small gesture from me can make such a big impact on someone so far away.
lenders.occupational_info: I do medical research in the United States.

lenders.name: patut
lenders.loan_because: I need loan to open school for children that live in street to find money just for eat.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to teach poor children but i don't have enough money to do that, so i need to borrow US$200.000 just in one week then i will return it.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I think we are all here to help each other.  This was such a great way to be able to help even with just a little.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a marketing company that helps business's stay in touch with their clients.

lenders.name: Mrs DuSel
lenders.loan_because: Our class is studying Spanish and the Spanish Speaking world and we want to help make someones dreams come true.

lenders.name: Laila
lenders.loan_because: I've been helped by so many in my life and am grateful & blessed for the abundance within my life.  KIVA is helping me 'pay it forward.'

lenders.name: The Eddie Family
lenders.occupational_info: Magazine and web publishing.

lenders.name: Ida
lenders.loan_because: A little help can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I deliver babies in one of the busiest hospitals in Washington, D.C.

lenders.name: Craig W. Beebe
lenders.loan_because: I have the ability to do so, and believe that we all share a responsibility to lift up those around us.
lenders.occupational_info: PhD student in Higher Education at Florida State University. Partner to a wonderful person, papa to some crazy dogs.

lenders.name: Jimmy Two Shoes
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find places to live and call home.  I help people buy and sell their homes.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help my sisters and brothers in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase services for the government.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help someone else who is working their own business as I know how hard it is myself to succeed.

lenders.name: Agustin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving a person in need a hand up & not a handout.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I care about you!
lenders.occupational_info: I create communication cable designs that carry the Internet from computers to regional hubs.

lenders.name: Jared
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the development of local, sustainable, environmentally responsible businesses in the developing world.

lenders.name: Kent & Gigi
lenders.loan_because: Life has been good to us and we want to share our good fortune with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businesses identify new markets and grow their business.

lenders.name: Jhilson
lenders.loan_because: I believe in creating change thru actions
lenders.occupational_info:
- Help farmers learn new skills in Economy and Marketing

- Ayudo a los granjeros a aprender cosas nuevas en Economia y Mercadeo

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy to make a difference in someone else's life. I'm really glad I'm able to help with the money I'm able to give.

lenders.name: Scott and Gail
lenders.loan_because: We want to see other people make a better life for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Electrician

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I can, and it's the right thing to do... besides it's a huge blessing and I get a real kick out of it!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping the poor in spirit, helping the poor in fact!

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: In Kiva, I have finally found an affordable way to help others in need.  I am eternally grateful to the person who founded this organization and offered me a way to give back with a feeling that I am actually helping.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired legal secretary who now spends most of my time with my grandchildren while my children work.  I feel blessed to be able to do this.

lenders.name: Florante
lenders.loan_because: "You must be the change you wish to see in the world." (Mahatma Mohandas Gandhi).

lenders.name: Mary Kay Keller
lenders.loan_because:
I am so blessed. I want to share my blessings with others! 
Check out my new book on my website! Hassle Free Bedtime!
lenders.occupational_info: I want to make chilren's lives better! All children!

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.......I didn't know it would feel so good!

lenders.name: Dylan
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to have everything I need, therefore it is important to help those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: EVERYONE DESERVES A CHANCE!

lenders.name: Iris
lenders.loan_because: Women need empowerment. Even me. Lord knows I'd rather be doing this for someone American - especially an African-American woman; but if there are women who can set up shop with all the red tape and taxation that prevent me from easily doing same, women who can provide for selves and family for an amount that is chump change for an American worker, then if I've got it to lend, I'm glad to help. Then one day, maybe that person will help their countryman succeed, and maybe one day I'll be able to do the same. As of 1/12/10, though, my thoughts are with helping Haiti rebuild.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a newspaper. Businesses who want to sell a product or service send information to me, and I turn that information into advertisement that they can publish in the newspaper. I try to make the advertisement catch the eye of a potential buyer!

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this method can really make a difference to the people the loans are advanced to and also I have control over where & to whom the money is advanced
lenders.occupational_info: Making a safe comforting environment for my family and friends where they can always feel accepted and loved for who they are - not what they do or how much they have.

lenders.name: Amy and Randy
lenders.loan_because: The Lord has blessed us with all that we need and I want to help others

lenders.name: Clint
lenders.loan_because: From the heart of man leaps forth one brush stroke of hope and the world is changed forever.
lenders.occupational_info:
Across the misty valley he sees not the trees, but the forest. And in the land he lives he sees what was, and what will be. And it is upon his shoulders that the weight of the universal land restoration charge  shall rest.

Please Help Restore The Land,

Plant Trees,

Plant Hope,

Be Kind To Nature,

Be Kind To Each Other,

Thank You......You Rock !!!

lenders.name: Elzbieta
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and have been helped out by so many people.  I believe that people can accomplish so much when they have others who believe in them.  This is my way of saying I believe in you.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and my family, and I hope to be a blessing to someone else.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to help other women.
lenders.occupational_info: I help busy people with the demands of their daily life.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: People should help each other if they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently am a full-time college student and plan on working in the Conservation and Natural Resource arena.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: I am single with two grown married children  and I know how hard it is to raise children alone and make ends meet. If I can continue to be blessed with a roof over my head then I will try and help someone else secure a roof over they're heads as well...God bless.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital that deals with very sick people with addictions and mental health issues.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage entrepreneurs in less-developed areas and help women where the odds might not be in their favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of the operations at an art museum in Los Angeles. I am also an entrepreneur working on building a small hotel in Central America. I'll need a loan myself one of these days!

lenders.name: Tom Malthus
lenders.occupation: Minister - First Church of Economic Agnosticism
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to make a small dent in our life purpose to reach utopia.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a minister in the First Church of Economic Agnosticism.  We don't know if there is a God or not, but if there is, He/She is most likely using the laws of supply and demand to govern the universe.  We are currently seeking a prophet.

lenders.name: gerard
lenders.loan_because: microcredit is the most effective way to empower women and thus reduce poverty in the developing world.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is our responsibility to help others who are less fortunate, if we ALL contribute the quality of life for so many people and families could greatly improve!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in skin care, massage, health well being and beauty.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I'm highly in support of entrepreneurship and providing the means for one to achieve their dreams and improve their lives. I'm inspired by their innovative spirit and their efforts to make things happen.
lenders.occupational_info: Empower others. Change the world. Leave it a better place.

lenders.name: Marco Antonio
lenders.loan_because:
I feel good when I help those who need it the most.  And coming from Guatemala, thinking that it could be me needing a helping hand....well...I'd be elated knowing someone half way around the world would be willing to invest in me.  You'd might call it, "Paying it forward"
:-)

Que Dios los bendiga!
lenders.occupational_info: I am on a journey . . . a journey of discovery.  And although I do not know where that journey is taking me, I have not forgotten where I started.

lenders.name: Nico
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Hiu Lam
lenders.loan_because: Arrr, I be need'n to hide me booty somewhere!

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves...install dignity, self-worth and self-sufficency into anyone and there is a whole lot of room for success!

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Work with small to mid sized companies to start or enhance the  retirement benefits they offer their employees.

lenders.name: Kimberlee
lenders.loan_because: I can have a positive impact on someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a shelter for victims of domestic violence.  Women and their children can leave abusive men and come stay in our shelter and be safe.

lenders.name: Herb J
lenders.loan_because: Loans provide assistance without robbing people of their dignity. Giving charity may make us feel good, but does not allow the recipient to be our equal.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with The Salvation Army in the United States.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I have everything I could ever want in life and feel very fortunate.  My children and I do this together and it brings us together :).  Pass It On!!!

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in parts of the world that I've visited.  I've recently been in Armenia and Peru so am concentrating my lending in those parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I managed people that worked with computers

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and I know how hard it is to get a business up and going and keep it running once established.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse and  a Licensed Hairdresser

lenders.name: Juliette
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in orther peoples lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help families find homes to live in.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want people to know that someone out there cares and wants to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people everyday improve their financial situations and settle their problems in Milwaukee, WI, U.S.A.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to create prosperity through global trade, and that takes capital.  I particularly want to provide  business  women in Islamic countries with the capital they need to be financially secure.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in international trade

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy my career and my lifestyle very much and I would like to help hard working people around the world realize their own dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and produce television programs for U.S. networks.

lenders.name: Julie Anne
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: pondering
